description.raw:
In this PR I address [CLOUD-72](https://osrfoundation.atlassian.net/browse/CLOUD-72).

In the `cs-usermetrics` element, admins are now allowed to create identities and their instance hours budget, along with setting whitelisted and enabled parameters of the metrics config. Admins can edit the metric config as well, by clicking the items in the list.

Along creation or edit, Admins can grant read and write permission over the resource to a given identity. This is an input field, with the default input value being src-admins. A blank input means that no permission should to be granted.

In the screenshot, you can see that the config for the identity "Test" sets it's budget to 4 hours, exhausting it.

I had a problem with some responses from the API. I opened [CLOUD-101](https://osrfoundation.atlassian.net/browse/CLOUD-101) to keep track of it. Perhaps it's not the API itself but the grants element. I couldn't have access to the grantee nor the resource with the grant callback's event details.

Several test metric configs were created. They should be deleted, but the API is not implemented. The issue for this is [CLOUD-98](https://osrfoundation.atlassian.net/browse/CLOUD-98).

fyi @andres_fortier
ptal @chapulina

Screenshots:
![screencapture-localhost-8080-profile-1495037598415.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/oyRq5d/images/198454939-screencapture-localhost-8080-profile-1495037598415.png)
![screencapture-localhost-8080-profile-1495037615466.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/oyRq5d/images/632648429-screencapture-localhost-8080-profile-1495037615466.png)
